Package ch.epfl.lasec.mova

Interface Summary
InteractiveProof  
 

Class Summary
AsyncTester  
CommitmentTest Unit test to test Commitment scheme.
CommunicationProtocol Class implementing functions to communicate Mova parameters, key, and start confirmation or denial protocols.
ConfirmationProtocol Class used to implement the MOVA confirmation protocol.
ConfirmationProtocolTest Class used to run unit test on the confirmation protocol
DenialProtocol Class used to implement the denial protocol.
DenialProtocolTest Class used do perform unit tests on the denial protocol class.
KeyPair Class representing a key pair:
(sk,pk)
where sk is the secret key and pk is the public key
KeyPairGenerator Class used to generate the public key and the secret key.
KeyPairGeneratorTest Unit test for the key pair generator.
Message class representing a message.
MessageTest Class used to unit test the class Message.
Mova Class representing a MOVA instance.
MovaHelper Class used to regroup function that are implemented in C for optimization concern.
MovaPublicKey Class representing the public key in MOVA.
MovaPublicKeyTest Unit test used to test class MovaPublicKey
MovaSecretKey In MOVA the secret key is a secret group homomorphism This class represent a secret key in the MOVA scheme.
MovaSignature Class used to represent a Mova signature.
MovaTest  
PseudoRandomGeneratorTest  
YGroupElement Class representing the elements of the YGroup.
YGroupElementTest Unit test for class YGroupElement
